name: 6th Edition of Global Conference on Plant Science and Molecular Biology
content: Magnus Group is pleased to invite you to its “6th Edition of Global Conference on Plant Science and Molecular Biology (GPMB 2020)” held during September 10-12, 2020 in Paris, France. Plant Science and Molecular Biology conference provides you plenty of opportunities to collaborate and discuss the latest trends, innovations and field works. It discusses a wide range of topics within the field of plant Science and Molecular Biology.
